name: Refoss
0:
”Alexa, turn on light.”
”Alexa, turn off light.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Thank you for choosing Refoss products.
First of all, download, install and login Refoss app on your smart phone. Then add your Refoss devices following instructions in Refoss app. After that, find Refoss skill in Amazon Alexa app then verify and link your Refoss account.
Refoss skill is designed for Refoss smart plug, bulb, surge protector, wall switch, humidifier, thermostat valve, and etc.
Simple device, simplify your life.
